title: counselor who can answer specific questions, call % 212/484-1222, which is staffed daily weekdays from 8:30am to 6pm EST, weekends from 9am to 5pm EST. For British visitors, the NYCVB Visitor Information Center is at 33-34 Carnaby St
You can order the Official NYC Visitor Kit by sending an A5-size self-addressed envelope and 72p postage to the above address

For transit information, call the Metropolitan Transit Authority’s MTA/New York City Transit’s Travel Information Center at % 718/330-1234. For online information that’s always up-to-the-minute current, visit www.mta.nyc.ny.us
